comments: One of my favorite steakhouses in NYC.
I'll definitely be going back again.
I would recommend the steak over peter luger.
When you want a special meal/steak, this should be in the top three choices.
Get the world famous, mouth watering mutton chop. You'll thank me later
Don't come too often, but when I do I get the mutton chop and saut√©ed mushrooms. Out of this world!
It's Peter Luger. Do I need to say anything more?
The best steaks i've ever had!
Food was okay, overpriced for the ok quality.
If I could I would eat Prime Rib every single day, I really liked it.
Don't have much to say here, but for prime rib, this gets my label as the best prime rib I have ever had, and I have had my share of prime ribs.
The prime rib is amazing. Mind you I'm a somewhat prime rib snob...
Been here 10x - I've been meaning to try the burger. Will have to wait until next time the Cote de Bouf every damed time.
If you're here with a date, then the Cote de Boeuf can't be beat.
Go. Get the Black Label Burger. Get the Cote de Boeuf. You won't be disappointed.
